brainly_data.question:
Which of the following statements is true of population and population density in East Asia

A. Around 70 percent of Japan’s population lives in the region between Tokyo and China.
B. More than half the population of Mongolia lives in Ulan Bator
C. Population policies caused the population in China to decline during the 1950s
D. In the koreas and Taiwan, population densities are found in eastern coastal areas
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: C not 100% sure that is right
